CustomField.description: See if the Account has had any Tasks since the last Owner Change
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Last_Activity__c), IF(ISBLANK(Last_Owner_Change__c), true, false), IF(ISBLANK(Last_Owner_Change__c), true, IF(Last_Activity__c < Last_Owner_Change__c, false, true)))
CustomField.label: Has Activity
